sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng zhēngqiú nǐ de yìjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais solliciter ton avis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like to seek your opinion.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa réaction est très rapide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His reaction is very fast.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il dirige l'orchestre symphonique pour la représentation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He conducts the symphony orchestra for the performance.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我通过中介租到了房子。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ tōngguò zhōngjiè zū dào le fángzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai loué un appartement par l'intermédiaire d'une agence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I rented an apartment through an agency.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Imaginons l'avenir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's imagine the future.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yào xuéhuì yùnyòng suǒ xué zhīshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut apprendre à appliquer les connaissances acquises.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should learn to apply the knowledge you've learned.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez vous dépêcher de terminer la tâche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please hurry up and complete the task.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shèjī shì yī xiàng Àoyùn xiàngmù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le tir est un sport olympique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Shooting is an Olympic sport.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le plan est mis en œuvre progressivement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The plan is being implemented step by step.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut se concentrer quand on étudie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should concentrate when studying.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ kāi yī zhāng fāpiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner une facture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me an invoice.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 作者描写了美丽的风景。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuòzhě miáoxiě le měilì de fēngjǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'auteur a décrit un beau paysage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The author described the beautiful scenery.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons maintenir l'ordre public.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should maintain public order.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè hěn zìxìn de rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une personne très confiante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a very confident person.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin de rassembler des informations.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to collect some materials.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons économiser les ressources naturelles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should conserve natural resources.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il recherche une vie parfaite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He pursues a perfect life.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le bateau a accosté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The boat has reached the shore.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En tant qu'enseignant, je suis très fier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: As a teacher, I am very proud.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le Premier ministre a prononcé un discours important.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The prime minister delivered an important speech.
